item.title: Week 16 - Chi-Squared
item.description: Handouts Functions Lab Weekly Prep Workflow Lecture Slides Bar Plots We covered bar plots very quickly during Week-02 of the semester. They are created using the geom_bar() geom in a ggplot2 call: ggplot(data = mpg, mapping = aes(class)) + geom_bar()
